title: Riven's CC
body: Why does Riven have so much CC to go along with a shitload of damage, this isn't a rant, but looking at other champs, it's hard to find another that has the CC AND the damage that Riven does, isn't it a bit much?

No, the actual cooldown is 13 seconds because she may not use all 3 Q's (against a Maokai or Kassadin for example, or simply if she doesn't want to).

Q cooldown is 6 seconds fully extended with no CDR. But keep in mind that a Riven with only 1 Q left is still super weak, so that's a potential 9 second window. Hell, the difference between 1 Q is a lot, all game.

She has no proper gapcloser and can often be killed before she gets to you. Also much harder to troll people over walls, since she needs to get to third Q, then wallhop, as opposed to a Jayce who can just press Q.

Imo the bigger problem is just how she can get on top of you so fast. It's impossible to kite her AND she has loads of CC and a shield. People used to complain about Irelia when everyone was playing her but you could at least kite her.
